com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.views

Class ApplicationViewsSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.views.ApplicationViewsSupport

  • public final class ApplicationViewsSupport
extends Object
    Support for built-in application views in VisualVM. Currently publishes Overview, Monitor and Threads subtabs for Application and Overview subtab for ApplicationSnapshot.
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider getMonitorView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Monitor application subtab.
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider<Application> getOverviewView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Overview application subtab.
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider<ApplicationSnapshot> getSnapshotMonitorView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Monitor application snapshot subtab.
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider<ApplicationSnapshot> getSnapshotOverviewView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Overview application snapshot subtab.
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider<ApplicationSnapshot> getSnapshotThreadsView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Threads application snapshot subtab.
      PluggableDataSourceViewProvider getThreadsView()
      Returns PluggableDataSourceViewProvider for Threads application subtab.
      static ApplicationViewsSupport sharedInstance()
      Returns singleton instance of ApplicationViewsSupport.
